skillTree.localised_description: Imbued with the awesome power of Manann, Lord of the Sea, this enchanted harpoon has brought down many a gigantic sea monster.
A giant Undead crab, whose pincers can tear ships apart, makes an impressive and fitting mount for the earthly offspring of Manann himself.
"It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"
You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!
Some think her a freak abomination, but Manann's true and only daughter knows different.
In death, her brave former-adversary has proved a useful replacement for Aranessa's blasted limb.
"Beasts of the sea, I command your allegiance…"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for all Sartosan, Rotting Prometheans and Rotting Leviathan units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Rotting Prometheans and Rotting Leviathan units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Aranessa has been at sea since a very young age, so her talent for seafaring has had many years to flourish and grow.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for all Sartosan units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Her very long tenure at sea, much of it spent relying on nothing but her own wits, means Aranessa has become quite skilled with a cannon.

Ammunition: +15% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units

Army ability number of uses: +1 for "Norse Roar", "Zhufbar 42-pounder" and "Sartosa Grapeshot"

skillTree.localised_description: You really don't want to run into this one, ever, under any circumstances... Yes, really.

effects.description: Increased plunder from encounters at sea

skillTree.localised_description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

skillTree.localised_description: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.

skillTree.localised_description: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

skillTree.localised_description: "Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for all Sartosan units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike hard, strike true.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
Bone, muscle and sinew cannot always be relied upon to hold together unassisted.

skillTree.localised_description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
They could not break free, even if they wanted to.
Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.
If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

skillTree.localised_description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

skillTree.localised_description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.
Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.
Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Aranessa Saltspite is the most feared pirate in all of Sartosa, but none fear her more than the Norscan curs she hunts.

items.colour_text: So named for its ability, in the right hands, to bring down one of the most - if not *the* most - savage sea monsters in existence.
